title: Stormfront (website)
summary: Stormfront is a neo-Nazi Internet forum, and the Web's first major racial hate site.[2][3] The site is primarily focused on propagating white nationalism, antisemitism, Holocaust denial and white supremacy.[4][5][6][7][8][9] In addition to its promotion of Holocaust denial, Stormfront has increasingly become active in the propagation of Islamophobia.
